raw_body: WIJAYARATHNE – PEARLY MALLIKA (nee Handunetti). Beloved wife of late Ronald Wijayarathne,​ loving mother of Asha &Thakshila (EDB),​ mother-in-law of Ravi & Srinath,​ grandmother of Marlon,​ Roshanara & Thinula,​ passed away peacefully on 14th May 2024. Remains lie at The Restpect Parlour,​ Borella on Wednesday 15th May. Cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4.00 p.m.      032404
